name: Mend
description:
YOU CAN HEAL YET, OH BROKEN ONE.


A personal game inspired by my experience with self harm and recovery. Guide a weary traveler on their journey to self acceptance.

This game is currently in development. A playable teaser is available now for Windows PC & MAC.

Designed and developed by Anth Rodi with music by Braxton Burks

This game currently requires a gamepad to play. Keyboard controls coming soon! Sorry for any inconvenience!

[CONTROLS - GAMEPAD]

left stick: movement

A: play chord

B: play chord

X: play chord

Y: play chord

Start: reset game
